data.name: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning - Weapons & Armor Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Prepare your hero for every type of battle with the Weapons & Armor Bundle Pack! The bundle includes the Sorcery, Might, and Finesse Packs.

Weapons & Armor Bundle Pack Includes:

Reckoning Sorcery Bonus Pack

Equip your hero with a unique selection of Sorcery-enhancing gear. Includes the unique armor set "The Valley", a unique helm, talisman, and three unique weapons to boost your magic attack damage, magic resistance, and mana regeneration skills.

  • The Valley Robes
  • The Valley Cowl
  • The Valley Handwraps
  • The Valley Shoes
  • The Truth (Shield)
  • The Flame (Staff)
  • The Song (Chakrams)
  • The Field (Sceptre)

Reckoning Might Bonus Pack

Equip your hero with a unique selection of Might-enhancing gear. Includes the unique armor set "The Guardian", a unique helm, shield, and three unique weapons to boost your damage resistance, health, and attack damage.

  • The Guardian Cuirass
  • The Guardian Helm
  • The Guardian Gauntlets
  • The Guardian Chausses
  • The Guardian Greaves
  • The Mountain (Hammer)
  • The Tower (Shield)
  • The Beast (Longsword)
  • The Forge (Greatsword)

Reckoning Finesse Bonus Pack

Equip your hero with a unique selection of Finesse-enhancing gear. This pack includes the unique armor set "The Running Man", a unique helm, shield, and three unique weapons to boost your critical attack damage, evasion, and stealth skills.

  • The Running Man Armor
  • The Running Man Hood
  • The Running Man Gloves
  • The Running Man Leggings
  • The Running Man Boots
  • The Moon (Shield)
  • The Wind (Fae Blades)
  • The Night (Daggers)
  • The Hunter (Longbows)

data.short_description: Prepare your hero for every type of battle with the Weapons & Armor Bundle Pack! The bundle includes the Sorcery, Might, and Finesse Packs. Weapons & Armor Bundle Pack Includes: Reckoning Sorcery Bonus Pack Equip your hero with a unique selection of Sorcery-enhancing gear.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows XP SP3 / Windows Vista SP2 / Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: 2.2GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or 2.6GHz AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM for Windows XP / 2 GB Windows Vista and Windows 7
  • Hard Disk Space: 10.5 GB
  • Video: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 / 512MB RAM or better, ATI Radeon HD3850 / 512MB RAM (with Pixel Shader 3.0 support), 1280x720 minimum supported resolution
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Windows XP SP3 / Windows Vista SP2 / Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Intel Core 2 Quad or 2.6GHz AMD Phenom X4
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM for Windows XP / 4 GB Windows Vista and Windows 7
  • Hard Disk Space: 10.5 GB
  • Video: NVIDIA GeForce GTX260 / 1GB RAM or better, ATI Radeon HD4850 / 1GB RAM (with Pixel Shader 3.0 support), 1280x720 minimum supported resolution
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX®: DirectX 9.0c
